1. Artificial Intelligence: A Modern Approach. Stuart Russell and Peter Norvig. Prentice Hall. (3rd Edition)
2. Pattern Recognition and Machine Learning. Christopher Bishop. Springer.
3. Dive into Deep Learning. Aston Zhang, Zack Lipton, Mu Li, Alex Smola. https://d2l.ai
好像第1本是教材，其余两本是参考书。不过去年上的时候完全没见过教材（）ppt加上雨课堂回放就挺好的
